issue_name: Iranian Government-Sponsored APT Actors Compromise Federal Network, Deploy Crypto Miner, Credential Harvester

1.description: Isolate the affected systems to prevent further compromise.

2.command: Collect and review relevant logs, data, and artifacts
2.description: Take a memory capture of the device(s) and a forensic image capture for detailed analysis.

3.command: Solicit support from a third-party incident response organization
3.description: Engage a third-party incident response organization to ensure the actor is eradicated from the network and to avoid residual issues.

4.command: Report incidents to CISA or FBI
4.description: Report incidents to CISA via CISAâ€™s 24/7 Operations Center or your local FBI field office.

5.description: Ensure affected VMware Horizon and UAG systems are updated to the latest version.

6.command: Remove vulnerable components from the internet
6.description: Consider removing vulnerable components from the internet to limit the scope of traffic until the update is fully implemented.

7.description: If upgrading is not immediately feasible, implement temporary solutions using an account with administrative privileges.

8.description: Execute the vendor supplied script Horizon_Windows_Log4j_Mitigations.zip without parameters to ensure that no vulnerabilities remain.
